title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\InstanceReference
name: InstanceReference
description:
Reference to another Cloud SQL instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.InstanceReference

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name of the Cloud SQL instance being referenced. This does not include the project ID.

params.name: data.region
params.description: The region of the Cloud SQL instance being referenced.

params.name: data.project
params.description: The project ID of the Cloud SQL instance being referenced. The default is the same project ID as the instance references it.
